snippet: Hakeem Olajuwon, a two-time N.B.A. champion and a leading teacher of low-post moves, will visit the Knicks’ training facility next week to give lessons to the team’s big men.
abstract: Hakeem Olajuwon, a two-time NBA champion and Hall of Famer, will visit the New York Knicks’ training facility to give lessons on low-post moves.
lead_paragraph: Hakeem Olajuwon, a two-time N.B.A. champion and a leading teacher of low-post moves, will visit the Knicks’ training facility next week to give lessons to the team’s big men.

headline.seo: Olajuwon Will School Knicks Lessons in Low-Post Moves
headline.main: Olajuwon Will School Knicks in Low-Post Moves
headline.print_headline: Olajuwon Will School Knicks in Low-Post Moves That Put Him in the Hall of Fame
